body: Is Raging Raving in creature mode correctly treated as a multicolored permanent by Esper Stormblade's ability?
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: check interaction "as long as you control another multicolored permanent" with Raging Ravine

comments.body:
No. Fixed by changing the static ability to check the color flags of the permanent instead of checking the color type.

**Status:** Fixed
